alert.note: Alert for Houghton; Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 16 at 4:47AM EDT until October 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy, wet snow is expected to result in hazardous winter driving conditions for the Monday morning commute. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches expected along the spine of the Keweenaw Peninsula. Northwest to north winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Keweenaw and Northern Houghton Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 PM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the commutes Monday morning and Monday evening. Gusty winds and wet snow could bring down tree branches, resulting in sporadic power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Since this is the first winter storm of the season, extra caution is urged for those who must travel.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
